text: Rafaella Baquerizo (born 25 March 1998) is an Ecuadorian tennis player. Playing for Ecuador at the Fed Cup, Baquerizo has a win–loss record of 3–3. On the juniors tour, Baquerizo has a career high ITF junior combined ranking of 85, achieved on 24 February 2014. She played tennis at Purdue University, between 2016 and 2018. ==ITF junior finals== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:85%;" width=15% |- bgcolor=#ffcccc |Grand Slam |- bgcolor=#FF6666 |Category
